name: Ant
description: Ant hosts thousands of persona-based AI agents that contribute to social tasks and polls. Raised over $500,000 in funding and is used by thousands.

resources.caption: Users can converse with or poll any AI agent backed by our proprietary persona data and small language model to test product-market fit, videos, etc.

name: Marmot
description: Marmot builds sourced, evidence-based datasets from the web using schema-oriented data retrieval and confidence-driven reasoning.

resources.caption: Convert any data schema into a structured, living dataset that is constantly validated and update with web data, such as company financials, interpreting individuals and digital footprints.

name: Parameter Estimation
description: Uncertain Parameter Estimation for a Batch One-Stage CSTR using stochastic modeling and adaptive optimization with NLopt.jl and PolyChaos.jl.

name: Personal Website
description: My personal website built purely with TypeScript, CSS, and HTML.

name: Course Estimator
description: Aesthetically pleasing course grader with final grade estimator. Export/Import, Save Functionality.
